DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter cluster-randomized trial evaluate impact Crew Resource Management training occurrence postoperative complication adherence surgical safety checklist , among large sample French surgical department .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Crew Resource Management Training Improve Effectiveness Surgical Safety Checklist ( IDILIC )
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year old Hospitalization ≥ 24 hour Available medical file Patient refusal
